Drop down field examples with different options

Standard drop down

Notes

here are some notes

See it in action

Code

 
DropdownField(
    ".example-container>div>div",
    "Country",
    "Country",
    2,
    "dd1",
    dropDownOptions,
    {
        maxLines: 10,
        cssClassList: ["field1"],
    }
)
